name: Translate_planet_into_Vietnamese
title: Factorio Planet Mods Vietnamese Language Pack
author: takebee_mi
description:
Gói việt hóa cho các mod hành tinh Factorio. Bao gồm: aai-loaders, alien-biomes, ammo-loader, Arachnids_enemy, ArmouredBiters, Babelfish, BigBags, bigger-artillery, Big-Monsters, chest-auto-sort, Cold_biters, ElectricPoleRangeMultiplier, even-distribution, Explosive_biters, far-reach, flib, GunEquipment, inventory-repair, jetpack, mecha-start, MegaBotStart, mferrari_lib, Mining_Drones, PersonalMagnet, quantum-fabricator, RateCalculator, resourceMarker, robot_attrition, robotworld-continued, squeak-through-2, Toxic_biters, Updated_Construction_Drones.
Tự động dịch bằng DeepL, có thể cần chỉnh sửa thủ công.
